lines.content: * Entry point of the Dawson application.
* Initializes the application and starts the interaction with the user.
* Private constructor for the Dawson class, used for initializing the user interface, storage, and task list.
* Load tasks from storage if available, or initializes an empty task list if there is an issue.

*

These initialisations are mandatory and hence is declared in the constructor to ensure dependency.
* The main execution loop of the Dawson application.

*

This method continuously accepts user input, parses commands, and executes them until the
* user types a "bye" command, at which point the application exits.
* Base abstract class for all command classes in the Dawson application.

*

Each concrete command class will extend this class and
* implement the execute method to perform its respective functionality.
* Executes the specific command, manipulating the provided TaskList as needed.
* @param list The TaskList to be operated on by the command.
* @return A CommandResult containing messages and information about the execution of the command.
* @throws DawsonException If an error occurs during the execution of the command.
public abstract CommandResult execute(TaskList list) throws DawsonException;
